price: 51. Tenais jie sėdės, tenais jie prašys vaisių gausybės ir gėrimų.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ وَشَرَابٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā yadʿūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarābin
